Subjects: adultery; aphorisms; women, erring; women, satire directed against
_description: A tag translating Latin ‘Ignis quisquiliarum amor garcionum…’ which follows it, in a series of Latin sentences with English translations — two couplets

OxfLinLat129.Transcription:
ffyr of sponyslove of gromysale in a tankerdalys
                    weyward
OxfLinLat129.Note:
In a series of Latin sentences with English translations in a
                    schoolbook; written as prose.
